title: Twitter for Android will soon let you select text from tweets
content:
Twitter remains many people’s favorite social media platform. Despite its recent evolution and addition of new features — including a paid Blue subscription — it still is not as bloated as other services, like Facebook. The app remains relatively simple and under control — a statement I wouldn’t make about some of Meta’s apps. In

The post Twitter for Android will soon let you select text from tweets appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Twitter could soon allow you to select parts of a tweet's text on Android. The feature has been exclusive to iPhone users for a while now.
